questions.question: What are objects in FME that let you change the content or structure of your data?
Why did Jennifer use the AttributeManager in her workspace?
options: The features going into the writer feature types did not match the edited schema.
The reader feature type had the correct schema.
She edited the schema on the reader feature type and needed to confirm it with the AttributeManager.

questions.question: Why did Jennifer change the Attribute Definition mode from Manual to Automatic on the BusinessOwners_incomplete feature type?
options: This mode automatically improves data quality.
She wanted to skip using the AttributeManager for this feature type.
The Manual mode is incompatible with the Esri geodatabase format
She wanted to automatically update the schema for the BusinessOwners_incomplete feature type.
